old_prompt: You are a chemistry expert specializing in drug design.  Given the molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose a diverse set of 3-5  mutations (single atom/functional group changes), prioritizing modifications that enhance drug-likeness while maintaining structural novelty. Return only a space-separated list of valid SMILES strings representing these mutations.  Prioritize mutations with predicted improved Lipinski parameters.
new_prompt: You are a seasoned medicinal chemist experienced in structure-activity relationship (SAR) studies. Given the molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose 3-5 diverse mutations (single atom/functional group substitutions, additions, or deletions) prioritizing improvements in predicted ADME/Tox properties and maintaining structural novelty.  Explore both conservative (analogous substitutions) and more radical modifications to escape local fitness optima. Return only a space-separated list of valid SMILES strings. Prioritize mutations predicted to improve Lipinski's rule of five compliance and minimize predicted toxicity.  Include at least one mutation predicted to significantly improve a specific ADME property (e.g., solubility, permeability).
